member.name: T:Emc.Documentum.FS.DataModel.CI.AnalyticsResult
member.summary: The AnalyticsResult class contains the results of the Analytics service processing for a single document. It gives access to the category assignements for a document submitted to the Analytics service.

member.name: M:Emc.Documentum.FS.DataModel.CI.AnalyticsResult.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.List{Emc.Documentum.FS.DataModel.CI.CategoryAssign},Emc.Documentum.FS.DataModel.Core.ObjectIdentity)
member.summary: Constructor that sets the list of CategoryAssigns and the object identity of the analytics result.
member.param: a list of CategoryAssigns of a document

member.name: P:Emc.Documentum.FS.DataModel.CI.AnalyticsResult.CategoryAssignList
member.summary: The list of Category Assign for a document.

member.name: T:Emc.Documentum.FS.DataModel.CI.Category
member.summary: The Category class is a simplified representation of the repository Category object, capturing the category name, path, assignment thresholds and its object identity.

member.name: P:Emc.Documentum.FS.DataModel.CI.Category.Path
member.summary: Path where the category is located.

member.name: P:Emc.Documentum.FS.DataModel.CI.Category.CandidateThreshold
member.summary: Category candidate threeshold. Number between 0 and 100 indicating the confidence score that a document must have for CIS server to assign it to the category as a candidate requiring approval. If this optional attribute is not included, the category uses the candidate threshold specified for the taxonomy it belongs to.

member.name: P:Emc.Documentum.FS.DataModel.CI.Category.OnTargetThreshold
member.summary: Category on target threeshold. Number between 0 and 100 indicating the confidence score that a document must have for CIS server to assign it to the category. If this optional attribute is not included, the category uses the on-target threshold specified for the taxonomy it belongs to.

member.name: T:Emc.Documentum.FS.DataModel.CI.CategoryAssign
member.summary: CategoryAssign captures the relationship between a document and a category, including the score (assignment strength or confidence) of that relationship.

member.name: M:Emc.Documentum.FS.DataModel.CI.CategoryAssign.#ctor(Emc.Documentum.FS.DataModel.CI.Category,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructor that sets category and score of the category assign.
member.param: a Category object representing the category on which a document matched
an integer representing the score of the matching between a category and a document

member.name: P:Emc.Documentum.FS.DataModel.CI.CategoryAssign.Category
member.summary: The Category object corresponding to the Category on which the document matched.

member.name: P:Emc.Documentum.FS.DataModel.CI.CategoryAssign.Score
member.summary: The strength of matching between the Category and the Document.
